## Moe Counter

**Moe counter badge with multiple themes。**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/journey-ad/Moe-Counter)
[![ref-online-tool]](https://count.getloli.com/)
[![ref-official-doc]](https://count.getloli.com/)

### Parameters

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `countId` | `string` | `true` |  | Unique counter name | Not allowed to contain special characters. |
| ![ref-querys] | | | | | |
| `theme` | `string` |  | `moebooru` | Select a counter image theme | Supported: `random` `3d-num` `ai-1` `asoul` `booru-ffsr` `moebooru`. More themes: [More theme](https://github.com/journey-ad/Moe-Counter?tab=readme-ov-file#more-theme). |
| `padding` | `number` |  | `7` | Set the minimum length | Bettwen `1` and `17`. |
| `offset` | `number` |  | `0` | Set the offset pixel value | Bettwen `-500` and `500`. |
| `scale` | `number` |  | `1` | Set the image scale | Bettwen `0.1` and `2`. |
| `align` | `string` |  | `top` | Set the image align | Supported: `top` `bottom` `center`. |
| `pixelated` | `boolean` |  | `1` | Enable pixelated mode | Supported: `0` `1`. |
| `darkmode` | `boolean` |  | `auto` | Enable dark mode | Supported: `0` `1` `auto`. |
| `num` | `number` |  | `0` | Set counter display number | `0` for disable, if set, the counter will not count, only display the configured number. |
| `prefix` | `number` |  |  | Set the prefix number | The maximum value is `999999`, empty for disable. |

</details>

```txt
https://count.getloli.com/@{countId}{?theme,padding,offset,scale,align,pixelated,darkmode,num,prefix}
```
